pr_title: CATROID-1120 Refactor BaseActivity and related components to Kotlin
pr_body:
Ticket: https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-1120

### Your checklist for this pull request
Please review the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/blob/develop/README.md) and [wiki pages](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/wiki/) of this repository.

- [x] Include the name of the Jira ticket in the PR’s title
- [x] Include a summary of the changes plus the relevant context
- [x] Choose the proper base branch (*develop*)
- [x] Confirm that the changes follow the project’s coding guidelines
- [x] Verify that the changes generate no compiler or linter warnings
- [x] Perform a self-review of the changes
- [x] Verify to commit no other files than the intentionally changed ones
- [ ] Include reasonable and readable tests verifying the added or changed behavior
- [x] Confirm that new and existing unit tests pass locally
- [x] Check that the commits’ message style matches the [project’s guideline](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/wiki/Commit-Message-Guidelines)
- [x] Stick to the project’s gitflow workflow
- [x] Verify that your changes do not have any conflicts with the base branch
- [ ] After the PR, verify that all CI checks have passed
- [ ] Post a message in the *catroid-stage* or *catroid-ide* [Slack channel](https://catrobat.slack.com) and ask for a code reviewer

```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 11, 17, 6, 18, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'ndrnour', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 667509657, 'comment_body': 'same', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 11, 17, 6, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'ndrnour', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 667607112, 'comment_body': 'Ah! trivial mistake, Done!', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 12, 3, 52, 57, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'khushal1707', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 690107092, 'comment_body': 'Nice :+1: ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 8, 17, 7, 26, 35, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 690115209, 'comment_body': 'Please use https://kotlinlang.org/docs/collection-elements.html#retrieve-by-condition.
Since it is used three times in this file, extract it, please.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 8, 17, 7, 38, 44, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 690116523, 'comment_body': 'Nice :+1: ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 8, 17, 7, 40, 39, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 690122045, 'comment_body': 'You can also make compareByChecksum to a private extension Function if you like ;)', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 8, 17, 7, 48, 40, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 697102931, 'comment_body': 'Should I extract the lines 48 to 52 in a function, and replace `forEach` with `firstOrNull`?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 8, 27, 2, 12, 52, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'khushal1707', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 699966234, 'comment_body': '```suggestion
        val exisingCopy = dstSprite?.lookList?.firstOrNull(it -> it.file.checksumEquals(lookToCopy?.file))
        if (exisingCopy != null) return exisingCopy
        ....
        private File.checksumEquals(file :File?) { .... }
```
https://kotlinlang.org/docs/extensions.html', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 9, 1, 7, 47, 50, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 699967000, 'comment_body': 'Please rename compareChecksum to checksumEquals or smth similar', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 9, 1, 7, 48, 52, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'gPathpp', 'type': 'User'}]

pr_title: CATROID-1142 Refactor SoundListFragment and related files to kotlin
pr_body:
https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-1142

Refactored files:
- SoundListFragment
- SoundController
- SoundAdapter

Bugs: 
- while one sound is playing, on pressing another sound it pauses the player without changing the image -> now it pause the current playing sound with correct change in image and another song is being played on pressings play. 
- The sound now stops when we press back and leave soundListFragment.

### Your checklist for this pull request
Please review the [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/blob/develop/README.md) and [wiki pages](https://github.com/Catrobat/Catroid/wiki/) of this repository.

- [x] Confirm that new and existing unit tests pass locally
